title: Handel - Water Music [c18] (Archiv / Pinnock) [FLAC] [twistle]
description:
George Frideric Handel (1685-1759)
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Handel

This torrent contains one of the six CDs from the boxed set "Handel: Orchestral Works", but the CDs have also been published as individual discs outside the boxed set.  The cover above comes from a single-CD release.

The other CDs from the above set contain Handel's music for the Royal Fireworks (CD6, available at : https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5262654), and his concerti grossi (CD1-4, available at : https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5197009)

This recording, as with all by the English Concert, has been made using period instruments.

EAC FLAC
__
